string-array.name: messages
string-array.item: Hey how are you? I would like to talk to you. Call me as soon as you get this.
Thanks mate! Feel way better now.
Hey if you are in town on Mon/Tue the 20th and 21st, give me a call.
Hey team. Just a reminder: the meeting starts 10:00 am tomorrow. Please be on time.
Your dentist appointment with Dr.Smith is wednesday at 11 am. Please don\'t be late. We look forward to seeing you!
